name: Haunted PS1 Demo Disc: Spectral Mall
storyline:
HAUNTED PS1 DEMO DISC 2022:
SPECTRAL MALL
Invited to the Spectral Mall /
so come explore these ghastly halls /
What you'll find /
friend or foe /
are 18 LO-FI HORROR DEMOS
summary:
You've been invited to the Spectral Mall, so come explore these ghostly halls.
What you'll find - be they friend or foe - are 20 LO-FI HORROR DEMOS.
